text: The Harry S. Truman Presidential Library and Museum is the presidential library to honor and remember President of the United States Harry S. Truman. The library was started in 1957. It is on a hill facing U.S. Route 24 in Independence, Missouri. ==Other websites== * Harry S. Truman Presidential Library and Museum Truman Category:Buildings and structures in Missouri Category:Harry S. Truman Category:1957 establishments in the United States Category:1950s establishments in Missouri
title: Harry S. Truman Presidential Library and Museum
